body: I haven't figured out a good way to test the failure cases on CUDA - after getting `cuda runtime error (59) : device-side assert triggered` for these tests (as expected), all subsequent CUDA unit tests will fail with `RuntimeError: Creating MTGP constants failed.`, and not sure what's the right way to recover from the previous runtime error.
